>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.themes.Item.zGVrfCwAnW9Z3mvM]{Starwalker}

You know every trick in the book for prolonging the limited resources that keep you alive, from deliberately slowing your metabolic rate and breathing to tweaking your spacesuitâ€™s systems to squeeze every bit of energy out of them. Double the time you can go without @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#starvation-and-thirst]{food and water}, the time you can @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.SfkuzH5kxSAmG4nv.JournalEntryPage.n461i9lDXw303SiY#suffocation-and-drowning]{hold your breath}, and the duration of @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.WP7hddXW4mLXXXOg]{Environmental protections} for armor you are wearing.
